# Chair Tender for Saint-Hyacinthe, QC

## Project Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites submissions for the procurement, delivery, and installation of office seating to Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec.

## Key Dates

*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-09-15T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-09-29
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-12-15

## Tender Details

*   **Tender ID:** CB-8692-67855112
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Solicitation Number:** 2024-00317
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-09-01
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   ** Regions of Opportunity:**
    *   Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:**
    *   Saint-Hyacinthe, QC

## Contract and Delivery Information
The contractor shall purchase, deliver, and install office seating to Saint-Hyacinthe, QC by December 15, 2023. This tender is issued under Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/H, which covers office furniture.

## Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Catherine Clairoux
*   **Contact Email:** [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone:** (343) 596-9265

## Request for Documents

View the [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8692/2024-00317-rfp-amd002.pdf), [Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8692/2024-00317-rfp-amd001.pdf), [Request for Proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8692/2024-00317-request-for-proposal-%28rfp.pdf), and [Notice of Proposed Procurement](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8692
